entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
